name: Farm Fruit Poppers - A Fun Puzzle Game
name_original: Farm Fruit Poppers - A Fun Puzzle Game
description:
Do you like fun puzzle games and brain teasers? Then you will love our puzzles!

Farm Fruit is a unique and challenging fruit popping fun puzzle game that is loved equally by kids and adults.


FEATURES:
- Free puzzle HINT every day
- Rewards button for gold
- Great graphics with full ratina and iPhone 5 support
- you get Stuck powerUps will help or ask a friend

Download now, and try the fun puzzles where you are popping fruits, and having fun.

Here is a little bit about the game:

The game is easy to learn. Once you download this free app, you will be playing within minutes.
To win in this fruit popper game, get as many fruit bubbles as you can. The puzzles get more difficult as you go up in the levels. So make sure
you are up to the challenge of our brain teaser. See how many levels you can beat before the game becomes difficult. If you solve many puzzles,
you can brag about it with friends, and compare your scores with them.

Here is what some users are saying:

“Very cool puzzle game with the popper theme” - Alex

"These are fun puzzles. I have been playing for hours!" -- Dan

Pop all the Fruits with limited numbers of taps. This app is a free game, and offers in app purchases.

Need technical support with our fruit popper game, email: info@simpleapps.ca
